text: Roberto Luis Carnaghi Fern√°ndez (born May 13, 1938) is an Argentine actor. He has appeared in 44 movie, about 60 plays, more than 50 television programmes, and nearly 100 advertisements. He is known for his works with Tato Bores, an Argentine comedian. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine comedians
title: Roberto Carnaghi
